EmailTemplate.description: RMA has been created for the issue reported with Warranty(html version)
EmailTemplate.name: HTML RMA has been created for the issue reported with Warranty
EmailTemplate.subject: RMA Notification Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
An RMA has been created for the issue reported.
Please see below details for your reference:
RMA #- Replacement : {!if(Case.RMA_Replacement__c ='','To be provided by your PSR' ,Case.RMA_Replacement__c)} RMA #- Return : {!if(Case.RMA_Return__c = '','To be provided by your PSR', Case.RMA_Return__c )} Homeowner's Name : {!if(Case.Homeowner_Name__c = '','Not provided by caller during troubleshooting', Case.Homeowner_Name__c)} Estimated Delivery Date of Replacement : {!if(ISBLANK(Case.Est_Delivery_Date_of_Replacement_Text__c) , 'To be provided by your PSR', Case.Est_Delivery_Date_of_Replacement_Text__c)}
If you need assistance with return tags, BOL and pick-up request, kindly coordinate with your Partner Service Representative (PSR).
NOTE: RMA validity is 30 calendar days from the invoice date of replacement unit/s. If replaced unit will not be returned within the specified time range, debit or invoice amount will become overdue, thus, can affect orders and deliveries. Kindly confirm pick-up details by replying back to this email maximum of 3 days from replacement delivery date:
a. Pick-up date
b. Pick-up address
c. Contact person, phone, email
Thank you. SunPower
